articles.description: It's set to be a big haul for the sequel.
articles.content:
Avatar: The Way of Waterhas scored a huge box-office debut, with fans flocking to see the eagerly awaited sequel over the weekend. 
As reported by Deadline, James Cameron’s film, which has been 13 y… [+1931 chars]
